summary: This document is a compilation of FAA aircraft registration records for a Sikorsky S-76C helicopter (serial 760750, tail numbers N750A, N722JE, N162AE). It traces the ownership from manufacturer Keystone Helicopter Corp. to Air Ghislaine Inc., then to ASI Wings LLC, and includes related correspondence, bills of sale, and registration renewal applications.

persons.name: Lawrence P. Visoski
persons.context: Signed an Aircraft Registration Application as a manager.

persons.name: James D. Clark
persons.role: Senior Vice President, Controller & Chief Accounting Officer
persons.context: Signed an Aircraft Bill of Sale on behalf of ASI Wings LLC via its managing member, Aetna Inc.

persons.name: Melinda Westbrook
persons.context: Signed FAA registration documents as Assistant Corporate Secretary of Aetna Inc. (managing member of ASI Wings LLC) and as Managing Member of ASI Wings LLC.

persons.name: Brandt S. Sterling
persons.context: Sent a letter on behalf of ASI Wings LLC requesting a duplicate Certificate of Registration for the helicopter.

persons.name: Nikala Auna Jones
persons.role: Requester (likely at Insured Aircraft Title Service)
persons.context: Requested reservation and assignment of special registration number N162AE for the aircraft on behalf of ASI Wings LLC.

persons.name: Chris Shurkus
persons.role: S-76 Program Manager at Sikorsky Aircraft
persons.context: Signed an Aircraft Bill of Sale from Sikorsky Aircraft Corporation to Air Ghislaine Inc. in December 2008.

persons.name: David A. Ford
persons.context: Signed an Aircraft Bill of Sale from Keystone Helicopter Corporation to Sikorsky Aircraft Corporation in 2008.

persons.name: Shaun M. Gebhard
persons.role: S76 Quality Assurance Production Supervisor at Keystone Helicopter
persons.context: Sent a letter to the FAA requesting correction of the aircraft model registration from S-76C-2 to S-76C for several helicopters, including serial 760750.

persons.name: Jinny Rosales
persons.context: Authored a memorandum to file noting a prior record search for the helicopter.

persons.name: Lisa Thomas Gaskin
persons.role: Senior Administrator, Special Services at Aero Records & Title Co.
persons.context: Submitted requests to the FAA on behalf of clients (Keytone Helicopter Corp. and Air Ghislaine Inc.) for reservation and assignment of special registration numbers.

connections.description: ASI Wings LLC purchased the helicopter from Air Ghislaine Inc. (via intermediate owner Freedom Air International, Inc.), as shown in the 2011 Warranty Bill of Sale.
Sikorsky Aircraft Corporation purchased the helicopter from Keystone Helicopter Corporation in 2008, per the bill of sale.
Air Ghislaine Inc. purchased the helicopter from Sikorsky Aircraft Corporation in December 2008, per the bill of sale.
Aetna Inc. is listed as the managing member of ASI Wings LLC, with its officers signing documents on behalf of the LLC.
Sterling acted as a legal assistant corresponding with the FAA on behalf of ASI Wings LLC.
Gaskin, on behalf of Aero Records & Title Co., submitted FAA registration requests for Air Ghislaine Inc.
Gaskin, on behalf of Aero Records & Title Co., submitted FAA registration requests for Keystone Helicopter Corp.

events.title: Sale to Air Ghislaine Inc.
events.description: Sikorsky Aircraft Corporation sells the Sikorsky S-76C helicopter (serial 760750, tail N750A) to Air Ghislaine Inc.

events.title: Name Change and N-Number Assignment
events.description: Air Ghislaine Inc. changes its name to Shmitka Air Inc. and is authorized to change the helicopter's tail number from N750A to N722JE.

events.title: Sale to ASI Wings LLC
events.description: Freedom Air International, Inc. (which held title after Air Ghislaine/Shmitka) sells the helicopter to ASI Wings LLC via a Warranty Bill of Sale.

events.title: Authorization for Special Number N162AE
events.description: FAA issues an Assignment of Special Registration Numbers authorizing a change from N722JE to N162AE for ASI Wings LLC's helicopter. The authorization expires in 2012 without being completed.

events.title: Sale from ASI Wings LLC
events.description: ASI Wings LLC sells the helicopter (tail N722JE) to an unspecified purchaser, as indicated by a 2019 Aircraft Bill of Sale.

locations: Oklahoma City, Oklahoma (FAA Aircraft Registry location)
6425 S Denning Rm 118, Oklahoma City OK 73169-6937 (FAA courier address)
PO Box 25504, Oklahoma City OK 73125-0504 (FAA mailing address)
keyFacts: The helicopter (Sikorsky S-76C, serial 760750) was owned by Air Ghislaine Inc. in December 2008, a company name prominently associated with Jeffrey Epstein's associate Ghislaine Maxwell.
Ownership later transferred to ASI Wings LLC, a company linked to Aetna Inc. as its managing member.
The FAA records show an attempt to change the tail number to N162AE in 2011, which was authorized but never completed and later cancelled.
The aircraft registration documents include routine FAA forms but trace a chain of ownership involving entities of interest in the Epstein case.
The helicopter's model was initially incorrectly registered as S-76C-2 and later corrected to S-76C at the manufacturer's request.
